name: Point of Sail
description:
Plunder! Pillage! Sailing! Loot! Battle!

Your compass and all other means of navigation have stopped working now that you've entered the Grandiose Straightaway. You'll have to rely on your trusty Pog Lose to navigate to the Solitary Chunk so you can claim your throne of Plunderin' Monarch!

Fullscreen recommended.

Sail in the direction of the red arrow in order to progress.

Click to start moving, and click to stop moving.

You'll automatically sail in the direction of your cursor, and you automatically fire cannonballs.

Ram into other ships to destroy them, but beware! You are no match for Big Boy!
